description: This file provides utility functions for safe access to localStorage with JSON serialization and deserialization, encapsulated within a 'Storage' object with methods for get, set, and remove operations.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a JSON value from localStorage for the given key, returning a fallback if the key does not exist or if an error occurs.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Stores a JavaScript value serialized as JSON into localStorage under the specified key.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the specified key and its associated value from localStorage.
